properties.entry: SELECT MEMBER_NUMBER, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PWD, MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEMBER_EXP, MEMBER_IMAGE, MEMBER_JOIN_DATE, MEMBER_CHECK_CONTINUECOUNT, MEMBER_STATUS, MEMBER_INTRODUCE FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = ? AND MEMBER_PWD = ? AND MEMBER_STATUS = 'Y'
INSERT INTO MEMBER ( MEMBER_NUMBER, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PWD, MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEMBER_CHECK_CONTINUECOUNT ) VALUES ( SEQ_MNO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, 0 )
